00002 ! Subroutine : Differentials

00029 
00030  SUBROUTINE Differentials
00031 
00032 ! Common Variables
00033  USE Domain,      ONLY : inv12, inv6, ni_f, xl_f, xu_f, yl_f, yu_f
00034  USE FluidParams, ONLY : gradPhiX_f, gradPhiY_f, lapPhi_f, phi_f
00035  IMPLICIT NONE
00036 
00037 ! Local Variables
00038  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00039 
00040 
00041 ! Differentials needed for the interfacial terms 
00042  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00043    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00044 
00045 ! Calculate differential terms
00046      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00047      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00048      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00049      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00050 
00051 ! Laplacian
00052      lapPhi_f(i,j) = ( phi_f(ie,jn) + phi_f(ie,js) + phi_f(iw,jn)    &
00053                    + phi_f(iw,js) + 4.D0*( phi_f(ie,j) + phi_f(iw,j) &
00054                    + phi_f(i,jn) + phi_f(i,js) ) - 20.D0*phi_f(i,j) )*inv6
00055 
00056 ! Gradient
00057      gradPhiX_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( phi_f(ie,j) - phi_f(iw,j) ) + phi_f(ie,jn) &
00058                      - phi_f(iw,js) + phi_f(ie,js) - phi_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00059 
00060      gradPhiY_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( phi_f(i,jn) - phi_f(i,js) ) + phi_f(ie,jn) &
00061                      - phi_f(iw,js) - phi_f(ie,js) + phi_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00062 
00063    END DO
00064  END DO
00065 
00066  RETURN
00067  END SUBROUTINE Differentials
00068
